text: Approved wiring device schedule reviewed and matched to architectural layout
Device types (decora, tamper-resistant, GFCI, USB, dimmer) coordinated with spec and finishes
Height and spacing checked against accessibility standards and project specs
Box sizes adequate for conductor fill and mounting
Conductors terminated properly with no exposed copper
GND conductors bonded to box (if metal) and device grounding terminal
AFCI/GFCI circuits connected to correct line/load terminals and identified properly
Devices securely mounted flush to wall finish (GWB, tile, concrete, wood)
Cover plates flush, aligned, undamaged, and color-matched
GFCI receptacles tested for trip and reset functions
Dimmer switches and multi-way switches tested for function
USB outlets powered and tested with load
All receptacles voltage-tested for polarity and grounding
Device labeling complete (breaker ID, circuit ref) where applicable
As-built location drawings and inspection logs submitted

id: • CSA C22.1 (CEC Section 26, 86), NEC Article 210 & 406, UL 498, CSA B651
• Manufacturer Specs: Leviton, Lutron, Hubbell, Eaton, Pass & Seymour, Schneider Electric
